extendedInfo.description: It is an application to back up pictures to the SD card preparing for terminal failure/loss or change model.Do you have a solution of backup of pictures in your terminal in preparation for affairs such as a terminal failure or mode change?Recent terminals have an internal SD with the large capacity in the body for pictures, but built-in SD can not be removed. So when you change the terminal, you need to back up your important pictures.1)Haven't you experienced some trouble when you change the terminal?*It is difficult to distinguish between internal SD and external SD among album in the gallery.*For ordinary people, the folder management application is too confusing.*If you are convinced that you finished to backup data to SD, the external SD has no data.2)This simple application can solve such problem.  *The pictures showed in the gallery can be saved to external SD by only one touch. *The pictures saved in external SD can be restored to internal SD by only one touch.Let's back up to avoid losing your precious pictures.

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: need to get this fixed....as soon as you open it ...it closes
reviews.author: A Google User
